column21: Marie Curie, physicist, chemist and all-round philanthropist, celebrated here in one of our inspired T-shirts

column8:
Radium discovered by Marie Sklodowska Curie who was  pioneer  figure in radioactivity and  Nobel prized chemistry. Her image most of the time illustrated as  in her laboratory while she worked. My illustration  emphasizes  a science milieu and great scientific discovery. Likewise Marie Curie quotes
"I am among those who think that science has great beauty. A scientist in his laboratory is not only a technician: he is also a child placed before natural phenomena which impress him like a fairy tale."
column21: Marie Curie, physicist, chemist and all-round philanthropist, celebrated here in one of our inspired T-shirts

column8:
Marcel Duchamp was a controversial and very influential artist of the early 20th century. He began painting in the style of Fauvism, he then moved into experimentational Avante Garde with peices like Nude Descending a Staircase No. 2 (featured in this design), and began his 'ready-mades' sculptures, which consisted of household items such as the famous peice, Fountain, which was a signed urinal. The peice shattered artistic traditions, questioning and blurring the lines of artisanship and concept in art.
Duchamp helped change the course of art and played a crucial role in the development of Dada, Surrealism and Pop art.

His peices, Portrait of Dr. Dumouchel, and Self Portrait in Profile can also be seen in the design
column21: Creator of L.H.O.O.Q, the urinal and many other surreal and witty art pieces, Marcel Duchamp is admired here at weadmire.net.

column8: Being a great fan of Paul Thomas Anderson's 1999 film Magnolia, the design is based on a character from the film Frank T.J. Mackey played by Tom Cruise and his TV show Seduce and Destroy in which he teaches men on how to seduce women.  I think that Tom Cruise plays the character brilliantly and brings humour to the film as his show is laughable however also has an underlying meaning.  The character mis-treats woman because he is insecure and has a self-destructive behavior as a result of childhood trauma, a main theme that runs through the film.
column21: Being a great fan of Paul Thomas Anderson's 1999 film Magnolia, the design is based on a character from the film Frank T.J. Mackey played by Tom Cruise and his TV show Seduce and Destroy in which he teaches men on how to seduce women.
